title: AmbroseLEE
author: AmbroseLEE
content: Nowadays I'm searching for the new coins to invest, and finally I find a unique coin. The name of the coin is 'Cratos'.I haven't heard of this coin before, but some of my friends already invested to this coin.So I searched it on CMC and CG. And the explanation shows the POWER of the project.Look at the explanation below. This is shortened version."Cratos is a V2E (Vote To Earn) cryptocurrency designed to facilitate citizen participation in the CRATOS mobile app, a real-time live vote platform, where users can generate a vote topic in her/his preference, and other users can participate in the vote. The demographic data will display immediately after voting. Users on the app can earn Cratos tokens based on their activities."I think it will be a great chance to make the world better. TO THE MOON!

comments.author: Minecache
comments.body: I have never heard of it before, it seems like a new name in the market after p2e, m2e, and just recently I saw that the project is called 'sleeptoearn'. I think you should avoid this project or you should observe for a while to see if this project has real potential or not. We are in the bearish season and today bitcoin continues to have a slump indicating that the market is not ready for a bull run in the near future.Investing in new projects is currently not recommended because it is too risky, old projects are also struggling with ferocious bears, so new projects are easy to become scams. and disappear quickly.
